events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer role and will begin our review process shortly.
Your application has been categorised under Engineering based on your experience with software development and devops practices.
A recruiter specializing in Engineering candidates has been assigned to your case to guide you through the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview is scheduled to assess your technical foundation and software development experience.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming availability for the initial screening interview scheduled next week.
The technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th. This will focus on software engineering concepts and problem-solving skills.
You completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong knowledge in development and devops principles.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your fit within the company culture and your career aspirations.
You have successfully completed the HR interview with positive feedback regarding your communication and enthusiasm.
An offer for the Software Engineer position has been extended, including details about compensation and benefits.
We received your positive feedback and questions regarding the offer, which we are happy to clarify further.
You have formally accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you to our engineering team.
Your onboarding process began today, including access to our company systems and initial training schedules.
The hiring process for the Software Engineer role is now officially closed with your successful onboarding completed.
